title: PBS NewsHour full episode October 12, 2015
text: Monday on the NewsHour, President Obama speaks out about the Hillary Clinton email controversy. Also: Whatâ€™s next for Jason Rezaian after being found guilty in a Tehran court, Syrian refugees in Jordan struggle to survive, Angus Deaton wins the Nobel Prize in economics, why charter schools suspend the youngest students and an NBA player returns home to his native Congo.
